attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow residential buy to let properties into SIPPS pension funds. This will provide a timely and needy boost to the residential housing market/Construction sector that is currently stagnant, it will allow individuals to provide better for their retirement and will start to generate stamp duty income for the government funds.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
